articles.title: Chefs Ashley Capps and Travis Schultz reinvent their ready-made meal service in Woodfin
articles.author: Kay West
articles.summary: Ashley Capps and Travis Schultz started New Stock as a meal delivery and subscription service in 2020. In 2022, they opened NewStock Pantry retail shop on the ground level of Riverview Station in the River Arts District. In May 2024, they moved production to the Woodfin location, just a few months before Tropical Storm Helene dumped 28 feet of river water inside the shop. In mid-October, they were back in business, operating as New Stock.
